Claudia Rapp here successfully draws a systematic portrait of episcopal authority in late antiquity which consciously eschews the binary secular / religious model .Her model , based on late antique discussions of leadership , is that late antique bishops exercised leadership through three modes of authority : spiritual , ascetic , and pragmatic .
